join hortbot 999 foobar 1

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!command add test Hey! (_ONLINE_CHECK_)
send_any

twitch_get_stream_by_user_id {"ID": 1, "Err": "ErrServerError"}
handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!test
no_send

twitch_get_stream_by_user_id {"ID": 1, "Stream": {"started_at": "2000-10-01T00:00:11Z", "viewer_count": 1234}}
handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!test
send hortbot #foobar [HB] Hey!

twitch_get_stream_by_user_id {"ID": 1, "Err": "ErrServerError"}
handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!test
no_send
